front.setup:
Put Coil: Scheming and Coil: Acting into play, "Evil Mastermind" side up.
Put Underground Base into play.
Note that Coil: Scheming activates before Coil: Acting.

front.title: Evil Mastermind

text.p: At the start of the villain turn play the top card of the environment deck. At the end of the villain turn all villain targets regain 2 HP.
When this card would be destroyed flip it instead

front.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, if Coil: Acting has more HP than this card, set this card's HP to its HP

back.title: Defeated
back.text: If Coil: Acting is flipped to the "Defeated" side, the heroes win the game.
back.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, flip this card and set its HP to Coil: Acting's HP

front.title: Evil Mastermind

text.p: At the start of the villain turn reveal cards from the villain deck until you reveal a Parahuman. Put it into play then shuffle the other revealed cards into the villain deck. At the end of the villain turn deal H energy damage to the hero target with the highest HP. When this card would be destroyed, flip it instead

front.advanced: At the end of the villain turn if Coil: Scheming has more HP than this card set this card's HP to its HP

back.title: Defeated
back.text: If Coil: Scheming is flipped to the "Defeated" side, the heroes win the game.
back.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, flip this card and set its HP to Coil: Scheming's HP.

card.name: Underground Base
card.text: Villain targets are immune to environmental damage

card.name: Mercenaries
card.text: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals H - 1 energy damage to the two hero targets with the highest HP

card.name: Sundancer
card.text: This card is immune to fire damage. At the end of the villain turn, this card deals 2 fire damage to all hero targets

card.name: Trickster
card.text: The first time Trickster would be dealt damage each round, redirect it to the hero target with the lowest HP. At the end of the villain turn, the hero with most cards in play destroys 1 card

card.name: Genesis
card.text: When this card is destroyed, shuffle it back into the villain deck. At the end of the villain turn, this card deals 2 poison damage to H hero targets

card.name: Ballistic
card.text: Whenever a hero card is dealt damage by this card, that hero must destroy one of their cards. At the end of the villain turn, this card deals H + 1 projectile damage to the hero target with the highest HP

card.name: Dinah
card.text: Coil: Scheming and Coil: Acting cannot be damaged. Whenever this card is dealt damage during a hero's turn, that hero must discard a card

card.name: Circus
card.text: Whenever a hero plays a card, this card deals that hero 1 projectile damage

card.name: Trainwreck
card.text: Whenever a non-villain target would damage a villain target other than Trainwreck, redirect the damage to Trainwreck. At the start of the villain turn, Trainwreck regains H HP

card.name: Let's Try Something Else
card.text: Put the villain trash on top of the villain deck. Shuffle the villain deck. Play the top card of the villain deck

card.name: A Backup For Every Asset
card.text: Take all Ongoing cards out of the villain trash and put them into play

card.name: Teleporter
card.text: At the start of the villain turn, reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until you have revealed H targets. Put the revealed targets into play, shuffle the rest of the revealed cards back into the villain deck

card.name: Two Bites at Every Cherry
card.text: Increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1. Damage dealt by villain cards is irreducible

card.name: Plans Within Plans
card.text: Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 2
